https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/tcXyHceQxSvViCKgI8XvGV8rDqp.jpg Julius is an upper-class boy in Lima in the 1940s. He lives in a palace with his aristocratic family and extensive servants. As the years go by, Julius will gradually lose his innocence, discovering and never understanding an adult world full of inequalities and injustices. A World For Julius
